author: FinbertNgo
chartsStats.noticeUtc: Stats follow UTC. In UTC{{utcOffset}}, new day updates after {{offset}}
desc.statisticsMsg: Show messages about the number of people who were able to solve a level
desc.numberFirst: Lock a number by tapping and holding it, then use it for multiple cells
desc.mistakeLimit: Limit the number of possible mistakes to {{limit}} per game
desc.autoCheckMistake: Mark numbers that don't match the final sudoku solution
desc.highlightDuplicates: Highlight repeating numbers in each row, column, and block
desc.highlightAreas: Highlight the block, column, and row for a selected cell
desc.highlightIdenticalNumbers: When selecting a cell with a number, highlight the same numbers throughout the grid
desc.hideUsedNumbers: Hide numbers that have been placed in 9 different cells
desc.autoRemoveNotes: Remove a number from all notes when it's placed in a cell
howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.slide1: The field is divided into irregularly shaped areas. These areas are called cages.
howToPlay.slide2: The sum of the numbers in the cells of a cage needs to match the value in the upper left corner.
howToPlay.slide3: The sum of all numbers in each block, row, or column always equals 45. Use subtraction to find the solution.
howToPlay.slide4: Can't solve a level? Try a hint! They can help if you get stuck on a tricky bit!
shareAppMsg: Check out this awesome Killer Sudoku game! It's a fun and challenging puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours. Download it now and start solving puzzles!
sendFeedbackTitle: We'd love to hear from you!
sendFeedbackMsg: If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback about the game, please don't hesitate to reach out. Your input is valuable to us and helps us make the game even better!
mailNotSupportedMsg: Your device does not support the mail app. Please send your feedback to the developer's email address: {{email}}
clearDataMessage: All saved data will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
